string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: New UI for exercise, bigger display!
Fixed a bug which didn\'t update rest times correctly
The rest timer and weight and repetition changes are remembered after rotating the screen
Small fix where users in the new plan restrictions couldn\'t see exercise descriptions
if the first exercise is an alternate and you already completed one exercise for the day, then navigating back to that workout will cause a flicker event. Click \'Alternate\' to escape it
Groundwork to limit which workout plans can be viewed
